Makes the 'save' button float, along with the 'last saved' message. I seem to always be at the bottom of the editor and the controls have scrolled off the top.

Keyboard Shortcuts

Save: Ctrl + s

Fullscreen Toggle: Ctrl + enter

Intent: Tab with selected text to indent, Shift + Tab to unindent

Move Lines: Alt + Up/Down Arrow key. Shifts one or more lines.
This makes appbuilder better:
The full-screen button does the same, but I get tired of switching back and forth.
